song.eTitle: O Splendor of God's Glory Bright

verses.verse: O splendor of God's glory bright, From light eternal bringing light; O Light of life, light's living spring, True day, all days illumining.
O Thou true Sun, on us Thy glance Let fall in royal radiance; The Spirit's sanctifying beam Upon our earthly senses stream.
O joyful be the passing day With thoughts as clear as morning's ray, With faith like noontide shining bright, Our souls unshadowed by the night.
